Hi all,

Joined the bandwagon and added some stuff for sale on
ebay.  If you are so inclined, please feel free to
visit.
http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQsassZkenwQQhtZ-1

Within a few minutes of my listing a non-japanese
sword, a collector of Burmese Dha swords informed me
of what I had.  Gotta love immediate information.  

Thanks for looking or better yet thanks for bidding. 
Maybe even free shipping to list members if you don't
live too far away and you remind me (for tsuba and
fuchi only).  Thanks.

Ken
